items.ja: Benitez joins 15th club of career as Panathinaikos boss
items.en: Benitez joins 15th club of career as Panathinaikos boss
items.text_for_match: Benitez joins 15th club of career as Panathinaikos boss Former Liverpool manager Rafael Benitez has been appointed head coach of Greek side Panathinaikos, the 15th club of his managerial career. Former Liverpool manager Rafael Benitez has been appointed head coach of Greek side Panathinaikos, the 15th club of his managerial career.

items.ja: Can Arsenal's defence lead them to title glory?
items.en: Can Arsenal's defence lead them to title glory?
items.text_for_match: Can Arsenal's defence lead them to title glory? Arsenal spent big in the summer to try to improve their attack, but it might be their defence that could end up winning them a first Premier League title in 22 years. Arsenal spent big in the summer to try to improve their attack, but it might be their defence that could end up winning them a first Premier League title in 22 years.

items.ja: What is the Premier League multi-ball system?
items.en: What is the Premier League multi-ball system?
items.text_for_match: What is the Premier League multi-ball system? items.ja: Villarreal shown 'lack of respect' over cancelled Miami game
items.en: Villarreal shown 'lack of respect' over cancelled Miami game
items.text_for_match: Villarreal shown 'lack of respect' over cancelled Miami game Villarreal say they have been shown "a complete and utter lack of respect" by La Liga over the cancellation of their overseas match against Barcelona in the United States. Villarreal say they have been shown "a complete and utter lack of respect" by La Liga over the cancellation of their overseas match against Barcelona in the United States.

items.ja: Rangers 'didn't screw up' head coach appointment
items.en: Rangers 'didn't screw up' head coach appointment
items.text_for_match: Rangers 'didn't screw up' head coach appointment Chairman Andrew Cavenagh insists Rangers did not "screw up" the process to appoint head coach Danny Rohl but admits it looked "clunky" from the outside.
